title: [GAMEPLAY] Illaoi W + Inhibitor
body:
It seems that Illaoi is unable to attack inhibitors when her w is active. 

I simply activated w and tried to attack an open inhibitor but the attack animation would not complete and this happened to me every time I tried to auto an inhib with her w active. When the w was no longer active I could attack the inhibitor again.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! 

In the future, please report PBE bugs on the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe), as it helps us better keep track of issues occurring on PBE versus live. ^-^
